short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks the annoying on-hover menu on the AU websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will disable the on-hover menu on all of Aarhus University's webpages. If the menu is needed it can be enabled by a single click on the AU logo in the address bar.
